headline: 49ers Follow a Mantra To a Field of Memories
abstract: Playing in a stadium abounding with warm memories, San Francisco will seek to join New England and Pittsburgh as the only franchises to win six Super Bowl titles.
lead_paragraph: SANTA CLARA, Calif. — A year ago Sunday, while the N.F.L. elite were competing in their conferences’ championship games, the San Francisco 49ers’ staff traveled to Mobile, Ala., to coach at the Senior Bowl. In keeping with that game’s custom, only the league’s worst teams receive that opportunity, but the 49ers were unbowed. At dinner one night, someone uttered three words that calibrated their expectations: “Mobile to Miami” — the site of Super Bowl LIV on Feb. 2.
